Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Mayfield
ShortDescription: 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Mayfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Mayfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Correction: No Trains Between Lake and Fullerton
ShortDescription: Correction: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Lake and Fullerton due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Lake and Fullerton due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Fullerton, and,
  • between 95th  and Lake, only.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include the #29 State bus.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
